comment:
* Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the view hierarchy is
     * attached to and detached from its window.

methods.name: public void onWindowAttached()
methods.comment: * Callback method to be invoked when the view hierarchy is attached to a window

methods.name: public void onWindowDetached()
methods.comment: * Callback method to be invoked when the view hierarchy is detached from a window
